name: Dogger (Sharing1Braincell)
description:
The less it knows the better!

Venture out into the world and put yourself in the shoes of a naturally dumb dog that simply loves his owner, following him to some shady places.

This is a short comedic narrative game about a small dog that does what comes naturally to him, oblivious to the human situations that arise around. What sort of wacky antics will this dogger get into?

Controls

Arrows or WASD Keys- Move     Z Key - Interact

Information

DOGGER and Sharing1Braincell is part of an academic project by ETIC Portugal made as a part of a weekly challenge to make games in GB Studio, assembling groups for the sake of bettering student teamwork, workflow and portfolio. This videogame in specific was made during a very busy week.
